content: the counting sheep hat is a free crochet pattern on my blog this lamb hat is an easy color work pattern that displays a series of wooly lambs all in a row this hat is made from the bottom up primarily in double_crochet and front post double_crochet stitches for the main body of the hat through the color work section then there are several decreasing rounds to create a more fitted beanie ribbing is added to the bottom edge for an easy fit the lambs are made by following a color work chart - changing colors as you go there is a link provided to help you with reading a graph changing colors as well as carrying or floating your colors on the back side of your work to minimize ends pattern includes written round by round instructions as well as full-color graphs pattern sizes included toddler child & adult sizes approximate finished size toddler approximately 16 circumference x 7 height child approximately 17 circumference x 8 height adult approximately 21 circumference x 9 height
